SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackgroundProp
A simple background prop like a plant, a building, or a cart that does not affect gameplay.
BalilaCart
A cart that plays a Balila seller sound when the Cat gets close.
CardboardBox
A destructible cardboard box that drops a Nubella when broken.
Cat
Main player character (the Cat) that the player controls.
CatController
Handles keyboard inputs to control the Cat character (moving, jumping, throwing, eating, shielding, pausing).
Destructible
Interface for destructible game objects that can take damage and be destroyed.
FinalScenePanel
A panel that shows the final scene with a fade-in and fade-out effect, then returns the player to the main menu.
FoodPickup
Represents a food pickup that the Cat can collect to restore resources.
Game
Main class that sets up the game window and starts the main menu.
GameState
Class that handles saving and loading the game state.
GameState.GameData
A simple class to store saved game data.
GameView
The main game view that draws the background, HUD elements, and game world.
GameWorld
Abstract base class that defines the shared behavior for all game levels.
Ladder
A ladder made of stacked sections that teleports the cat up or down.
LaundryString
A laundry string that plays an animation and drops a rug when touched by the cat.
Level1
Level 1 of the game where the cat starts its Hijazi adventure.
Level2
Level 2 of the game where the cat explores the busy souq area.
Level3
Level 3 of the game where the cat explores rooftops and obstacles.
LevelTransitionPanel
A panel that handles level transition with a fade-in and fade-out effect, displaying a "LEVEL COMPLETE!" message in the middle.
MainMenu
The Main Menu screen where the player can start a new game or load a saved game.
MouseHandler
Handles mouse inputs like scratching cardboard, charging nubella, and pausing the game.
MovingPlatform
A moving platform that moves horizontally or vertically between set limits.
MusicManager
Manages background music playback, including fading in and out.
NubellaPickup
Represents a Nubella pickup that the Cat can collect as a special weapon.
NubellaProjectile
A projectile fired by the Cat that deals double damage to enemies.
PauseMenu
A panel that appears when the game is paused, allowing the player to continue, save the game, or return to the main menu.
Pigeon
Enemy pigeon character that moves back and forth and attacks the player if close enough.
Platform
A static platform made up of tiled blocks for the player to walk on.
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
RockProjectile
A simple rock projectile thrown by the Cat.
RollingPaintBucket
A bucket that rolls toward the Cat when approached and damages on collision.
Roof
A solid roof object made of tiles, which can be rotated at an angle.
RugPickup
Represents a rug pickup that the Cat can collect for shielding.
SoundEffectManager
Handles playing sound effects, allowing or preventing overlap.
ThiefCat
Thief Cat enemy that sneaks towards the player, hisses, steals food, jumps over obstacles if stuck, and retreats after stealing or being hit.
WinObject
A static object that triggers level completion when the player reaches it.
